title: All sorts, just a clear out up date......

posts.content:
With retirement comes a clear out of the workshop and all that entails.......lots of stuff
There is too much to list, lots of tin ware, all genuine.
Without going into to much detail, if you guys out there need a part then feel free to drop me a mail.
All the parts will be cheep as to dump this lot would be a sin..
Just do me a list and I can only say no.
No big panels, some new chassis bits, glass, busted quarter lights, LHD steering box.
I have bay and splitty stuff.
Fire away..

Ron
Wow, that's a big response, I'm going through you all one by one, I'll get this all posted out to you all in time, all I ask is be patient please, so many people need parts.





ron@vwendangeredspecies.co.uk

Hi Ron. Would you have two Tailgate aligning buffers. Not sure of technical name but they are little rubber wages that fix to side of tail gate and they match up to the metal wedges on the tail gate opening. I'm also after a tail gate latch plate. Hopefully that makes sense.
Cheers Ron.
Terry.
Yep got the buffers...latch plate up or down..

68-71 chrome indicator switch?

any other 68 specific bay parts?

cheers

Hi Ron.
It's the latch plate that the tail gate locks onto. bottom of door if that helps. I can take a picture of where it goes if that helps.
Cheers Terry.
looking for belt trim piece for 23w/15w. Rear cargo door side LHD

Hi Ron

Have you got the two,little bits of tin that sit round the heat risers that warm the manifold on a twin port engine. They are held on with with two screws?

Jon

Looking for, all for split bus: a couple of round vw og exterior rear view bus mirrors, couple of og (logo painted) pointed hubcaps with good chrome (happy to polish if dirty), us spec bumper rear deluxe trim both sides, SO42 interior cabinet plastic block style handles, jalousie flyscreens, interior trim wood effect (printed aluminium??) around windows and SO42 electrical hookup, posted to Newquay, Cornwall, UK. Any of these you may have please feel free to pm. Thanks.
After an early bay LHD steering box if you've got one ?

I'm looking for the following if you've got any of them?...

>one original VW commercial hub cap with the embossed logo
>the one-inch diameter carb pre-heat pipe that goes through the left rear air deflector plate (the plate that goes under the rear tin)
>the right hand rear deflector plate that seals that side off (not the one with the cut-out for a right-hand carb pre-heat pipe)
>a small off-cut of rear cargo floor to patch a hole (6"x6" would be more than big enough).
>the small thermostat cover 'sled tin'
>a screw-terminal ignition switch
>a pedal cover pan
>a pair of US-spec dual-filament 56-57 rear 'bubble' tail lights and reflectors (yeah, I know, but you've got to ask...)
...
>teasmaid, deep fat fryer, cuddly toy

I really need a lower front cargo door hinge please.
Plus any Popout latches you may have.
Wiper mechanism and arms.
Wing mirrors and arms both sides.
Headlights
Deluxe sill trim
Bay window hubs
Bus 14" wheels x4

Cheers
I'd be interested if you had anything specific to a Canterbury Pitt
Hi do you have an Ivory Heater control knob for splitty ?
